# init(multiArray:)

**Initializer**

Creates a feature value that contains a multidimensional array.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(multiArray value: MLMultiArray)
```

## Parameters

- **value**: An [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLMultiArray] instance.

## Creating multidimensional feature values

- **init(shapedArray:)**: Creates a feature value that contains a shaped array.

items.description: Creates a feature value that contains a shaped array.
